dialogueLines.line: Hey, look. It's that guy with the blue hair!
dialogueLines.speaker: skid

dialogueLines.line: What are you two doing here?
dialogueLines.speaker: bf

dialogueLines.line: We're trying to find the Spooky Month festival.
dialogueLines.speaker: skid

dialogueLines.line: It says so on this flyer we found.
dialogueLines.speaker: skid

dialogueLines.line: Can you help us find the address on this flyer?
dialogueLines.speaker: pump

dialogueLines.line: But you have to rap battle us first.
dialogueLines.speaker: bf
